questions.q: What is the concentration of Vitamin C in the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
questions.a: The concentration of Vitamin C in the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is 10%.

questions.q: What skin types is the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum suitable for?
questions.a: The GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is suitable for Oily and Combination skin types.

questions.q: What are the key ingredients in the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
questions.a: The key ingredients in the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum are Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid.

questions.q: Are there any side effects of using the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
questions.a: Mild tingling may occur for sensitive skin.

questions.q: Can I use the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum if I have sensitive skin?
questions.a: Yes, but you may experience mild tingling.

questions.q: Will the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum cause any irritation to my skin?
questions.a: It may cause mild tingling for sensitive skin.

questions.q: How do I apply the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
questions.a: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen.

questions.q: When should I apply the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum, morning or night?
questions.a: Apply in the morning before sunscreen.
